definition: row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense

sentences.english: The stipulation of ongoing law is a little fragmentary and omits some necessary provisions.
sentences.chinese: 現行法律的規定略嫌零散，而且存在着盲區。

sentences.english: The localization of the definition of significant figures in the current teaching materials is verified with example analyses.
sentences.chinese: 以實例分析了現行教材中有效數字定義的侷限性。

sentences.english: Because the existing system is based on having an enemy.
sentences.chinese: 因爲其現行制度是基於一個假想敵。

sentences.english: the recruit made the current circulate in the circuit on the circumference.
sentences.chinese: 補充的電流使其在現行的環形電路內循環。

sentences.english: Because "to go with the" existing law is a fundamental principle.
sentences.chinese: 因爲“地隨房走”是我國現行法的一項基本原則。

sentences.english: Criminal laws stipulate that detention de bene esse can apply to active criminal.
sentences.chinese: 刑事訴訟法規定對現行犯可以適用先行拘留。

sentences.english: Would this change affect existing student visa holders?
sentences.chinese: 鐒這項變革對現行的學生簽證持有者有影響嗎？

sentences.english: In this regard, the prevailing star for Aquarius is Uranus.
sentences.chinese: 在這方面，現行的水瓶座守護星是天王星。

sentences.english: This new bill will be circulated along with current NTD100 bills.
sentences.chinese: 這版新鈔將與現行的百元鈔券同時流通。

sentences.english: Chinese-English translation is an important exercise in SEFC.
sentences.chinese: 漢翻英是現行中學英語課本中的一項重要練習。

sentences.english: This is the current cost of a new accounting requirements.
sentences.chinese: 這對現行的成本會計提出了新的要求。

sentences.english: Advise some ideas to improve the current electric and gas system.
sentences.chinese: 對現行的電氣系統提出改進意見。

sentences.english: The existing in-grid power pricing policies are lack of protection measures for desulfurized and clean power supply.
sentences.chinese: 現行竟價上網政策缺乏對脫硫潔淨電量的保護措施。

sentences.english: The current  occurrence of  torrent  spurs him to buy fur and  sulfur.
sentences.chinese: 現行的傾瀉事件驅使他買毛皮衣服和硫磺。

sentences.english: There are obvious weakness in tradional government accounting system in China.
sentences.chinese: 中國現行政府會計存在一系列弱點。

sentences.english: Present family planning policy has caused many disharmonies.
sentences.chinese: 現行計劃生育政策，造成了諸多的不和諧。

definition: provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
to set/to designate/to stipulate/to provide/to draw up/to formulate (rules etc)/stipulation
to implement/to carry out/to put into practice
